snippet: TRIAL OF MARGARET GARRITY.--The. trial of this unfortunate girl, for the murder of EDWARD DRUM was concluded on Saturday last. Gov. PENNINGTON, in summing up the case for the defense, made an able appeal in behalf of the prisoner....
lead_paragraph: TRIAL OF MARGARET GARRITY.--The. trial of this unfortunate girl, for the murder of EDWARD DRUM was concluded on Saturday last. Gov. PENNINGTON, in summing up the case for the defense, made an able appeal in behalf of the prisoner.
